body:
Hello Mostapha,

I recently opened up a honeybee/ladybug file today and tried to update it as per usual, however I am receiving an error stating: "1. Solution exception:Authentication failed because the remote party has closed the transport stream." 

I'm wondering if anyone else is experiencing the same issue today, or what it means and how to troubleshoot.

Thank you in advance,

Aaron

replies.body:
I just downloaded the zip from github and it seems to be fine now. 

Thanks
Hi Aaron, You are right. Update doesn't work right now and as you mentioned in another discussion the best way for now is to sync with github and use the folder.
